****************************************************************/
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb(i) push_back(i)
#define mp(i,j) make_pair(i,j)
#define line printf("\n")
#define space printf(" ")
#define sci(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define scl(i) scanf("%lld",&i)
#define chk(a) cerr << endl << #a << " : " << a << endl
#define chk2(a,b) cerr << endl << #a << " : " << a << "\t" << #b << " : " << b << endl
using namespace std;
char str[1000005];
char prin[1000050];
int main()
{
    int n,k;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
    cin.ignore();
    scanf("%s",str);
    int has[26];
    for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        memset(has,0,sizeof(has));
        for(int j=i;j<n;j+=k)
        has[str[j]-'a']++;
        int mx=-1;
        for(int u=0;u<26;u++)
        {
            if(has[u]>mx)
            {
                mx=has[u];
                prin[i]='a'+u;
            }
        }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
        printf("%c",prin[i]);
    return 0;
}
